topic: Surprising applications of AI in solar energy optimization
content: Generated from lens processing: My working hypothesis is that surprising discoveries often stem from challenging our fundamental assumptions and exploring unfamiliar territories. As a next step, I will actively seek out new experiences and knowledge areas outside my comfort zone, while reflecting on my cognitive biases and assumptions. This approach aims to foster an environment conducive to serendipitous discoveries that can prompt personal and intellectual growth.

metadata.trigger: What would surprise me if I found it?
